DOC.brief_summary: The objective study provide evidence fermentability dietary fiber collect information regard potential health opportunity glucose control well tolerability consume 7 day .
DOC.detailed_description: This study design randomize , 2-arm , treatment-controlled , within-subjects , 8-hour postprandial crossover study , utilize multiple sample paradigm evaluate fermentability potential health opportunity glucose control dietary fiber ( FCHO ) healthy non-obese men woman . The study include 2 - 8 h assessment follow consumption FCHO drink placebo drink follow 7 day feed period assess tolerability .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old BMI 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 , inclusive No clinical evidence cardiovascular , metabolic , respiratory , renal , gastrointestinal , hepatic disease No diabetes No Gastrointestinal issue Pregnant and/or lactate plan pregnancy Allergies intolerances food consume study Fasting blood glucose > 125 mg/dL . Vegetarian Taking counter fiber supplement supplement may interfere study procedure endpoint Taking actively probiotic purposely taking/ subscribe diet high prebiotics . Taking prescription medication may interfere study procedure endpoint ( eg. , antibiotic ) Subjects unusual dietary habit ( e.g . pica ) Actively lose weight try lose weight ( unstable body weight fluctuation > 5 kg 60 day period ) Excessive exerciser train athlete Addicted drug and/or alcohol Medically document psychiatric neurological disturbance Smokers ( past smoker may allow cessation > 2 year )
